scripts.dev:api: pnpm --silent exec -- bash -lc 'if [ -f .env ]; then set -a; source .env; set +a; fi; for arg in "$@"; do if [ "$arg" = "--verbose" ]; then export IMG2MESH3D_LOG_LEVEL=debug; fi; done; LOG_LEVEL=${IMG2MESH3D_LOG_LEVEL:-info}; cd packages/img2mesh3d && PY_BIN=python; if command -v python3.11 >/dev/null 2>&1; then PY_BIN=python3.11; fi && if [ -d .venv ]; then VENV_PY=.venv/bin/python; if [ ! -x "$VENV_PY" ]; then rm -rf .venv; else VENV_VER=$($VENV_PY -c "import sys; print(f\"{sys.version_info[0]}.{sys.version_info[1]}\")"); TARGET_VER=$($PY_BIN -c "import sys; print(f\"{sys.version_info[0]}.{sys.version_info[1]}\")"); if [ "$VENV_VER" != "$TARGET_VER" ]; then rm -rf .venv; fi; fi; fi && if [ ! -d .venv ]; then "$PY_BIN" -m venv .venv; fi && AI_KIT_PATH=/Users/jamesvolpe/web/ai-kit/packages/python; AI_KIT_INFERENCE_PATH=/Users/jamesvolpe/web/ai-kit/packages/python-inference; if [ -d "$AI_KIT_PATH" ]; then .venv/bin/python -m pip install -e "$AI_KIT_PATH"; fi && if [ -d "$AI_KIT_INFERENCE_PATH" ]; then .venv/bin/python -m pip install -e "$AI_KIT_INFERENCE_PATH"; fi && .venv/bin/python -m pip install -e ".[api]" && IMG2MESH3D_LOCAL_MODE=1 .venv/bin/python -m uvicorn img2mesh3d.api.app:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8080 --log-level "$LOG_LEVEL"'
scripts.dev:worker: pnpm --silent exec -- bash -lc 'if [ -f .env ]; then set -a; source .env; set +a; fi; cd packages/img2mesh3d && PY_BIN=python; if command -v python3.11 >/dev/null 2>&1; then PY_BIN=python3.11; fi && if [ -d .venv ]; then VENV_PY=.venv/bin/python; if [ ! -x "$VENV_PY" ]; then rm -rf .venv; else VENV_VER=$($VENV_PY -c "import sys; print(f\"{sys.version_info[0]}.{sys.version_info[1]}\")"); TARGET_VER=$($PY_BIN -c "import sys; print(f\"{sys.version_info[0]}.{sys.version_info[1]}\")"); if [ "$VENV_VER" != "$TARGET_VER" ]; then rm -rf .venv; fi; fi; fi && if [ ! -d .venv ]; then "$PY_BIN" -m venv .venv; fi && AI_KIT_PATH=/Users/jamesvolpe/web/ai-kit/packages/python; AI_KIT_INFERENCE_PATH=/Users/jamesvolpe/web/ai-kit/packages/python-inference; if [ -d "$AI_KIT_PATH" ]; then .venv/bin/python -m pip install -e "$AI_KIT_PATH"; fi && if [ -d "$AI_KIT_INFERENCE_PATH" ]; then .venv/bin/python -m pip install -e "$AI_KIT_INFERENCE_PATH"; fi && .venv/bin/python -m pip install -e . && .venv/bin/img2mesh3d-worker'
